entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:45 p.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -2.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 12:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -2.9°C

Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 97 %

Dewpoint: -3.3°C

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Freezing rain at times mixed with snow and ice pellets beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
